name: Disney's Active Play: The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride
name_original: Disney's Active Play: The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride
description:
Disney's Active Play: The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride is an arcade game developed by Disney Interactive, Creative Capers and Image Builder Software. It was originally released in 2001. Disney Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Disney's Active Play: The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride on PC.
